Message:
“I” became the demon that
commenced the Witch Hunt.

Innocent girls throughout
the world were executed
one after another.

Even as I created the
Witches of Qlipha,
and unleashed their
Curses upon the world,

Then, a small glimmer of light
shines through the darkness,
putting the pieces of my heart
back together.

...Ahh. This light is proof
that the Successor of
the Staff has come.

Now is the time to use
the little life I have left.

Summoning every ounce
of my strength will only
subdue the demon’s power
for a moment.

When the time comes,
please...put an end to me...

Forgive me for forcing this
difficult task upon you.

But, I beg you—
protect this world...
